医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
基于鼻软骨的膝关节治疗项目获得230万欧元资助用鼻子软骨治疗膝关节缺陷：维尔茨堡大学医院正在努力批准该手术。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/Nose-cartilage-based-knee-joint-treatment-project-receives-e282ac23-million-funding.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/Nose-cartilage-based-knee-joint-treatment-project-receives-e282ac23-million-funding.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6dd57a0f-d9b9-49c4-bd60-f0ff8f7e666f Wed, 21 Feb 2024 11:15:31 -0500 Nose cartilage-based knee joint treatment project receives €2.3 million funding
研究揭示黑人心力衰竭患者脉搏血氧计读数存在种族偏见密歇根医学的一项研究发现，使用脉搏血氧计测量血液中氧气水平的种族偏差可能会进一步限制患有心力衰竭的黑人患者接受可能挽救生命的治疗（例如心脏泵和移植）的机会。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/Study-reveals-racial-bias-in-pulse-oximeter-readings-for-Black-heart-failure-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/Study-reveals-racial-bias-in-pulse-oximeter-readings-for-Black-heart-failure-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2a0dcf3f-ec26-4cfb-a484-4280fac436fb Wed, 21 Feb 2024 10:51:47 -0500 Study reveals racial bias in pulse oximeter readings for Black heart failure patients
纽约大学朗格健康中心收到 7500 万美元捐赠，用于在佛罗里达州建立朱莉娅·科赫家庭门诊护理中心纽约大学兰格尼健康中心 (NYU Langone Health) 今天宣布，计划于 2026 年在佛罗里达州西棕榈滩开设朱莉娅·科赫家庭门诊护理中心 (Julia Koch Family Ambulatory Care Center)，朱莉娅·科赫家庭基金会 (Julia Koch Family Foundation) 捐赠了 7500 万美元。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/NYU-Langone-Health-receives-2475-million-gift-to-built-Julia-Koch-Family-Ambulatory-Care-Center-in-Florida。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/NYU-Langone-Health-receives-2475-million-gift-to-built-Julia-Koch-Family-Ambulatory-Care-Center-in-Florida。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f339f5d7-fcb3-41e9-bf5b-c322b58fb1d6 Wed, 21 Feb 2024 10:43:52 -0500 NYU Langone Health receives $75 million gift to establish Julia Koch Family Ambulatory Care Center in Florida
雌性人参化合物有望治疗骨质疏松症随着预期寿命的不断延长，治疗骨质疏松症等与年龄相关的疾病也面临着挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/Female-ginseng-compound-holds-promise-as-osteoporosis-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/Female-ginseng-compound-holds-promise-as-osteoporosis-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d2cb062f-8da8-44c5-9dd2-c4b344ea8ef9 Wed, 21 Feb 2024 09:56:29 -0500 Female ginseng compound holds promise as osteoporosis treatment
研究强调了 COVID-19 对有中风史的老年人的心理健康造成的影响多伦多大学的一项新纵向研究强调了 COVID-19 大流行对有中风病史的老年人造成的巨大心理健康损失。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/Study-highlights-COVID-19s-mental-health-toll-on-older-adults-with-中风-history.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/Study-highlights-COVID-19s-mental-health-toll-on-older-adults-with-中风-history.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f6ddeaf-acc8-4a1d-97fb-5098b128434b Wed, 21 Feb 2024 09:52:12 -0500 Study highlights COVID-19's mental health toll on older adults with stroke history
研究揭示睡眠在巩固复杂记忆中的作用睡眠有助于巩固我们对复杂关联的记忆，从而支持完成整个事件记忆的能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/Study-reveals-sleeps-role-in-consolidating-complex-memories.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/Study-reveals-sleeps-role-in-consolidating-complex-memories.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=51c98ef2-27fd-46bf-9d9d-3fbfe551843a Wed, 21 Feb 2024 09:47:00 -0500 Study reveals sleep's role in consolidating complex memories
AGA 指南认可粪便微生物群移植作为复发性艰难梭菌感染的治疗方法在第一个关于使用基于粪便微生物群的胃肠道疾病疗法的综合循证指南中，美国胃肠病学协会建议对大多数复发性艰难梭菌 (C. diff) 感染患者进行粪便微生物群移植 (FMT)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/AGA-guideline-endorses-fecal-microbiota-transplant-as-treatment-for-recurrent-C-diff-infection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/AGA-guideline-endorses-fecal-microbiota-transplant-as-treatment-for-recurrent-C-diff-infection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3ce6a6df-b557-4a55-9e36-3661879b6246 Wed, 21 Feb 2024 09:42:05 -0500 AGA guideline endorses fecal microbiota transplant as treatment for recurrent C. diff infection
缺乏身体活动和炎症会导致骨骼肌中与年龄相关的基因变化新的研究表明，老年人骨骼肌中基因和蛋白质表达的一些与年龄相关的变化可能更多地受到身体活动不足和慢性炎症的影响，而不是原发性衰老或内在成熟过程的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/Physical-inactivity-and-inflammation-drive-age-lated-gene-changes-in-skeletal-muscles.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/Physical-inactivity-and-inflammation-drive-age-lated-gene-changes-in-skeletal-muscles.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2a587f73-cbcd-4d31-abcb-0ee814ed7358 Wed, 21 Feb 2024 09:34:50 -0500 Physical inactivity and inflammation drive age-related gene changes in skeletal muscles
长时间观看电视和视频会增加夜尿风险在《神经泌尿学和尿动力学》上发表的一项研究中，每天花 5 小时或以上看电视和/或视频的成年人更有可能出现夜尿症，或者需要在夜间多次排尿。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/Prolonged-TV-and-video-viewing-linked-to-higher-risk-of-nocturia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/Prolonged-TV-and-video-viewing-linked-to-higher-risk-of-nocturia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d5c64d7f-63d2-41db-9714-ccf168554559 Wed, 21 Feb 2024 09:28:09 -0500 Prolonged TV and video viewing linked to higher risk of nocturia
瑜伽可能对背痛患者有益发表在《骨科研究杂志》上的新研究表明，瑜伽的身体姿势、呼吸练习和正念练习可能对背痛患者有益。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/Yoga-may-benefit-individuals-with-back-pain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/Yoga-may-benefit-individuals-with-back-pain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=440cd51e-bcbc-4eaa-b2a6-84680b0d5728 Wed, 21 Feb 2024 09:23:00 -0500 Yoga may benefit individuals with back pain
